desctiption.p: Mr. Rick Li has worked in the investment industry for over 13 years. After receiving his MBA degree from University of Maryland, Mr. Li joined Foster & Associates in early 2000. He has worked as an investment advisor since 2003. Mr. Li has gained in-depth industry exposure in North America financial markets and developed expertise in investing in China. In 2005, Mr. Li joined the board of directors and became the Chief Financial Officer. Mr. Li is fluent in Mandarin.
